Articles.Content:
KSP version 1.3.0, downloaded from steam, on windowns 7 32-bit. The game starts but on the loading screen it crashes, I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling, but the problem persists. My graphic drivers are all up to date.

 

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/an0id2l18xxcuxl/AAADbYu5B_keJGtYCDw4lZyIa?dl=0

You either have to remove/update all of your old mods to versions that are compatible with 1.3 or you have to revert back to KSP version 1.22.

And using a 32bit OS in this day and age is probably also not exactly helpful if you want to use mods.
